overview: Jordan went to her co-worker to confront her about dirty things she allegedly did at work to advance her career. To which Madison replies that she also has things to blame Jordan. Faced wiht this impasse, they decided to fuck to buy each other's silence.  After an argument between Jackie and her husband Grant, Jackie wants to apologize by planning something special for Grant. She blindfolds him and invites the young and energetic Amber to enter the room to please her husband.
title: Power Play
